title: Riot are you gonna do something about singed?
body:
I've been hating this guy for so long but riot doesnt seem to wanna touch him.he is so toxic(no pun intended)to play against.
he is basically a running simulator,you cant fight him because he will outspeed you and you will eat all the poison you cant farm because he will either surround you with his q or just throw you with his e,his w slow is so annoying not only the slow is big and its range is extremely easy to hit,you cant even {{summoner:4}} away from it and then he will come with the speed of light towards you.
he is 53.59% winrate for christ's sake.rito pls.
